snippet: The site seeks to present Mr. Gurlitt’s side of the legal dispute over the fate of the hundreds of pictures that were removed from his apartment in 2012 by German prosecutors.
abstract: The site seeks to present Mr. Gurlitt’s side of the legal dispute over the fate of the hundreds of pictures that were removed from his apartment in 2012 by German prosecutors.

headline.main: Cornelius Gurlitt, German at Center of Art-Cache Case, Sets Up Website
headline.print_headline: German at Center of Art-Cache Case Sets Up Website
